title: Design-Based Learning (DBL) Practical Course for Higher Education in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: An LMS-based asynchronous learning environment for working professionals, with provided digital devices and collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Learners can perform scientific problem-solving design project processes in four distinct phases: analysis-design-development-evaluation
Learners can collaborate with team members using LMS collaboration tools to develop scientific solution prototypes and suggest improvements
Learners can iteratively improve their design outputs three or more times based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
